catalog_info.title: Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru - Passenger FAQ
catalog_info.description:
This dataset contains frequently asked questions (FAQs) and their answers related to passenger travel at Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru. The data is available in both English and Hindi. 

**Technical Summary:** The dataset consists of six columns: 'category' (indicating the FAQ category, e.g., 'Passenger'), 'last_updated' (date of last update), 'faq_question' (English version of the question), 'faq_question' (Hindi version of the question), 'faq_answer' (English version of the answer), and 'faq_answer' (Hindi version of the answer).

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
